channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road name and numbers sign posts are rotten and the sign is loose and leaning. Its difficult for delivery drivers to see., 27th June
item.description:
Outside front garden of 34 Ratcliff Lawns GL52 3NT. The sign has been deteriorating for the 4 years we have lived in the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Ratcliff Lawns, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Missing sign showing that cycle route continues down Yew Tree and Ashbrittle Road and on to Business Park, 27th June
item.description:
Although there is a random "End of cycle path" sign on the descent from Lobleys Bridge at the Coopers' Edge sign (directing cyclists into the main carriageway at an unsuitable location), there needs to be a sign showing the cycle route going along Yew Tree Road, onto Ashbrittle Way and over the footbridge. Cyclists would never know that there is a cycle path ahead and therefore unncessarily ride on the winding road through the estate.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A trench formed of multiple potholes joined up, 27th June
item.description:
Along the left hand carriageway going from Vicarage Road near the Play Space. An attempt was made to fix one pothole but there are so many that they form a trench of varying depths.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53, Ermin Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 27th June
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed please lift an replace x2 sunken damaged drain covers with new stats required x2 650x500mm covers (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple large potholes getting worse!!!, 27th June
item.description:
Just at the lights for left turn into Hucclecote road from delta way there are multiple big and worsening potholes. Looks like others have reported this but nothing has been done?! Banged my tyre on them last week, drivers are now swerving to avoid them and this is not safe. Needs urgent attention.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two sets of offensive graffiti on the cycle route through Barnett Way, between Sainsburys & TSB, 27th June
item.description:
Two sets of offensive graffiti has been painted on the cycle route that runs through Barnett Way, between Sainsburys and TSB building. The graffiti is making an accusation and needs to be quickly removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnett Way, Barnwood, Gloucester

item.title: Overgrown grass/weeds on verge blocking pavement, 27th June
item.description:
Southbound on the A38 between Coombe Hill traffic lights and Pancake Lane (all the way along). Grass/weeds/stinging nettles overgrown along the verge to a point where my child has to walk into the road to get to the bus stop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Leigh, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
